pages.text: $(li)The Protection enchantment can be applied in any kind of Helmet, Chestplate, Leggins, Boots, Shields, Horse and Wolf Armors.$(br)$(li)This enchantment reduces the receive damage from most sources.
pages.title: Protection

pages.text: $(li)By default, it can be upgrade just until level IV.$(br)$(li)You can raise the level V of this enchantment using an Ancient Tome (Protection).
